message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay that amount for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $60. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $120. It's a fair price considering its value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll sell the product to you for $110, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. It's still a great value for the product, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product

I understand that you're still trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $105, which is the closest I can get to your offer. It's still a great value for the product, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $115, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great value for the product, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $99 for the product
